text: aur nihsandeh ahle kitaab (arthaat yahood aur eesaee) mein se kuchh aise bhee hain, jo allaah par eemaan rakhate hain aur tumhaaree or jo utaara gaya hai, usapar bhee, allaah se dare rahate hain aur usakee aayaton ko thodee thodee qeematon par bechate bhee nahin[1]. unaka badala unake rab ke paas hai. nihsandeh allaah jaldee hee hisaab lene vaala hai
